item.description:
If you have suddenly found yourself widowed at a young age, or if you were widowed in the past but would still benefit from interaction with others in the same situation, please join us.

An informal drop in meeting held on the 4th tuesday of every month (Sept thru June) from 7 - 8.30pm.
The discussions cover topics such as family, work, financial changes, social changes, grieving through the holidays and finding the day to day strength to move forward.

Being widowed at a young age can be a very isolating experience. This group provides a safe and supportive environment in which to discuss day to day issues as well as larger questions about the future.

Please feel free to join us at one of our monthly meetings.



Please note; the Admin building doors are locked at 6.30pm.
Please enter through the ER and take the elevator to the 1st floor and follow signs to the coffee shop.
If you have any problems finding us, please feel free to call me on my mobile at 508.367 8093.
Thank you,
Olive

group.name: The Boston Area Young Widow and Widowers Group

item.name: The Boston Young Widows and Widowers September Meetup
